Name: Battle Imagine - Muku Vanguard
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Muku Vanguard's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Spiral Fracture.

Stunt! Spiral Fracture
Summon Elite Muku Vanguard to charge forward, dealing Attack Damage.
Upon the skill cast, your Thunder Bonus is increased for a period.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Muku Vanguard's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Spiral Fracture.

Stunt! Spiral Fracture

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
